prefs.label: Send via Neato!
prefs.help: Determines whether the Send Via Neato! option should be under the Page section. Neato! is a Phone<->PC client for webOS.

prefs.label: Add to Spare Time
prefs.help: Determines whether the Add to Spare Time option should be under the Page section. Spare Time is an Instapaper client for webOS.

prefs.label: Add to Relego
prefs.help: Determines whether the Add to Relego option should be under the Page section. Relego is a Read It Later client for webOS.

prefs.label: Copy to Clipboard
prefs.help: Determines whether the Copy to Clipboard option should be under the Page section.

prefs.label: Shorten URL
prefs.help: Determines whether the Shorten URL option should be under the Page section. URLs are shortened with is.gd and copied to clipboard.

prefs.label: ReKindleIt!
prefs.help: Determines whether the ReKindleIt! option should be under the Page section. ReKindleIt! is a web service that sends articles to your Kindle. Opens in New Card.

prefs.label: Facebook
prefs.help: Determines whether the Facebook option should be under the Share section. Opens the Facebook app and posts as a status update.

prefs.label: Bad Kitty
prefs.help: Determines whether the Bad Kitty option should be under the Share section. Bad Kitty is a Twitter client for webOS.

prefs.label: Spaz
prefs.help: Determines whether the Spaz option should be under the Share section. Spaz is a microblogging client for webOS. Supports Spaz Special Edition, Spaz Beta, and Spaz Free.

prefs.label: Twee
prefs.help: Determines whether the Twee option should be under the Share section. Twee is a Twitter client for webOS.

prefs.label: Tweed
prefs.help: Determines whether the Tweed option should be under the Share section. Tweed is a Twitter client for webOS.

prefs.label: Carbon
prefs.help: Determines whether the Carbon option should be under the Share section. Carbon is a Twitter client for webOS. Does not work with Carbon beta.

prefs.label: Enable Private Browsing
prefs.help: Determines whether the Private Browsing option should be in the app menu.
